data.message: Have LOVED watching everyone's videos.  Thank you. ... but seriously.  Not once have I gotten a video of my own to even view let alone share,  regardless of all the nonsense I've tried.  I just keep getting the Thank You message with the same 6 images.  :-( It's free, so I shouldn't complain. .. I get it, but man.  :-( I'd be lying if I said I wasn't completely bummed!

replies.message: Same here... Except I don't get any images, just profile picture and cover photo. Totally weird.
Same with me..Thank you, celebrating 12 years on Facebook..only the thank you page??
same here. I've wasted over 2 hours and I can't seem to have my own Look Back. Any luck for anyone since then? thanks
me too .. keep receiving this thank you note fr mark n team
